comment: A generalization of the triangle inequality to the point-set distance function. Under the usual notation where the same symbol ` d ` denotes the point-point and point-set distance functions, this theorem would be written ` d ( a , S ) <_ d ( a , b ) + d ( b , S ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2015.)
